## toHTML() function

Converts a markdown string to HTML.

Supported markdown is Github

It also decodes HTML entities and cleans dirty dangerous tags.

All <a> hyperlink tags have `target="_blank"` added to open the URLs in a new window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toHTML(input: string, props?: {
    allowedTags?: string[];
}): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | String with markdown |
|  props | { allowedTags?: string\[\]; } | Optional props to pass that influence the behavior. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

String with HTML, wrapped with <p></p> tags.
